Reviews.Title: “Common hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jumparound65
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel located suburb 3 blocks subwaystation berlin public transportation car hotel offers free parking space guests surrounding hotel quiet local ammenities little supermarket round corner hotel bit dated spacious clean staff helpful breakfast excellent bothered beds poor quality dont sleep booked online paid €150 3 nights worth

HotelInfo.Name: City Gallery Berlin Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: Jenaer Strasse 2, 10717 Berlin, Germany
